mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board(id, locationNo, category, title, content) VALUES(#{id}, #{locationNo}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.id, b.locationNo, date_format(b.date,'%Y-%m-%d') date, b.title, b.content, l.locationName FROM Board b INNER JOIN Location l ON b.locationNo = l.locationNo WHERE b.category = 1 LIMIT #{from}, #{to}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Board WHERE category=1

SELECT b.id, b.boardNo , b.locationNo, date_format(b.date,'%Y-%m-%d') date, b.title, b.content, l.locationName FROM Board b INNER JOIN Location l ON b.locationNo = l.locationNo WHERE b.boardNo = #{boardNo} AND b.category = 1

SELECT b.id , b.locationNo, date_format(b.date,'%Y-%m-%d') date, b.title, b.content, l.locationName, b.boardNo FROM Board b INNER JOIN Location l ON b.locationNo = l.locationNo WHERE b.boardNo = #{boardNo} AND b.category = 1
